=== Current Issues ===
* Multimedia Keys - Aren't shown in xev or detected by gnome:
 Support, Mail, Internet, A, B, Volume +/- (works fine)
* Function Keys - Aren't shown in xev or detected by gnome:
 Brightness +/-, Display Toggle, Mute (works), Touchpad Disable (hardware controlled, works)
* Built-in Microphone:
 shows up in volume control.
 can't open sound recorder to test - 'Your audio capture settings are invalid. Please correct them in the Multimedia settings.'
* Brightness Control doesn't work period (gnome applet failed to find display)
* * /proc/acpi/video/GFX0/LCD/info
* * * device_id:    0x0400
* * * type:         UNKNOWN
* * * known by bios: no
* * /proc/acpi/video/GFX0/LCD/brightness
* * * <not supported>
* Wireless switch doesn't work.
* Plugging in headphones does not mute speakers and I see no way of manually doing this.
